title: Godinger Dublin Crystal 7 Pc. Wine Set
features: Set of 4 wine glasses, one decanter with stopper, and one silverplated tray.
One of several Godinger lead crystal beverage serving sets.
The Dublin pattern is world renowned for quality and value.
This beautiful set makes a great wedding or anniversary gift.
description: Serve your guests with the Dublin Crystal 7-pc. Wine Set, and bring the magic of Ireland to your dinner party. Designed with the Emerald Isle in mind, this set from the Shannon collection is handcrafted of 24% lead crystal, using centuries-old techniques perfected by Bohemian artisans. Pour the wine into the decanter before the guests arrive, so the beverage has a chance to breathe and release its full flavor and aroma. The 6 glasses and decanter feature deep decorative etchings that glint and sparkle in the light, and show off the color of the wine. Includes a 13" silver-plated serving tray. Outfit your home bar with full selection of matching drinkware from the Dublin Crystal collection (sold separately). Hand wash. Imported. Each 9-oz. goblet measures 8Hx3-1/4" dia.
